info.title: Policy API
info.description: The Policy API is intended to be used to retrieve policies and links that are created when an end-user completes the Access Workflow found within our Link Embed. This API is largely read-only, retrieving authoritative data that originates with and is controlled by an insurance company.  There are several fields which can be modified via this API in order to mange how Covie is handling and refreshing the underlying data.
info.summary: Server-to-Server API for retrieving and managing policy objects.

get.description: Retrieve a Policy object that was previously connected via a Link
Retrieve the contents of a Policy document
List all events that have been triggered for the selected policy
List integrations associated to an application

effective_date.description: Allow selection of policies that are not effective until a future date

logo.description: Brand logo to be used in the embed.

primary.description: Sets the primary color, the primary text style color, and the primary background color to the configured color.

display_name.description: Name to display as application name in the embed, on policy selection and data disclosure screens.

use_name_as_display_name.description: Display the integration's name as the application name in the embed. Cannot be set at the same time as display_name.

get.description: Retrieve the details of an integration.

patch.description: Edit the name and archived status of an integration.

name.description: A descriptive name of the integration

status.description: String representation of the current status of the integration.

logo.description: Brand logo to be used in the embed.

primary.description: Sets the primary color, the primary text style color, and the primary background color to the configured color.

display_name.description: Name to display as application name in the embed, on policy selection and data disclosure screens.

use_name_as_display_name.description: Display the integration's name as the application name in the embed. Cannot be set at the same time as display_name.

allow_inactive.description: Allows users to link policies that are currently inactive. Incompatible with effective_date.

effective_date.description: Allows users to link a policy if it will be active as of a given date. The date can be absolute (YYYY-MM-DD) or relative, with relative dates evaluated when the policy is being linked. Primarily used to allow pending policies to be linked. Incompatible with allow_inactive.

message.example: The Integration you are trying to delete has links associated.

get.description: Retrieves a Link

metadata.description: Arbitrary key value pairs. The entire object is replaced on-update (missing keys in the request body will be removed). Keys are alphanumeric plus _, -, ., and space, at most 64 characters. Values are at most 256 characters. You can have at most 32 metadata keys on a link.

tracking_frequency.description: The frequency of which tracking should be performed. This value is `never` when tracking is disabled.

get.description: Retrieves a list of policies associated with the requested link
Retrieves a list of events triggered for the requested link

post.description: Attach a policy document to a Link. If the document can be parsed, select the parsed policy for sharing.

Location.description: Link to access the uploaded document

self.description: Link to access the uploaded document

400.description: Cannot parse document when document parsing is required by application settings

post.description: Sync a tracked link with the provider using the stored user credentials

Location.description: The URL link we just synced

511.description: Stored user credentials are no longer valid

metadata.description: Arbitrary key value pairs. The entire object is replaced on-update (missing keys in the request body will be removed). Keys are alphanumeric plus _, -, ., and space, at most 64 characters. Values are at most 256 characters. You can have at most 32 metadata keys on a link.

provider_id.description: If supplied, selects the insurance carrier associated with the link. If the link is resumed from the embed, the insured will land on that carrier's login page. If policy documents are uploaded, parsing will be attempted based on the selected carrier.

post.description: Creates a link and optionally sets metadata and selects a carrier, allowing for seeding initial data before an insured continues the linking process via the embed

get.description: Retrieves a list of links associated to the requested integration
List all policies that have been linked to an integration.
Retrieves a list of links and selected policies associated to the requested integration
Retrieve a list of supported carriers for a given integration, along with their identifiers.

post.description: Replaces the existing integration key with a new randomly generated key.
Require all account users to have an MFA application configured

delete.description: Remove requirement for all account users to have an MFA application configured

get.description: Lists an application's links.
Lists an application's policies.
List an application's configured webhooks.

uri.description: URI the webhook should make a request to when the event is triggered.

headers.description: List of the headers and their values that should be included in the request.

get.description: Get the details of a webhook.

uri.description: URI the webhook should make a request to when the event is triggered.

headers.description: List of the headers and their values that should be included in the request.

get.description: List the events that have been triggered for a webhook.

count.description: Number of endpoints called by this re-broadcast

broadcasts.description: List of broadcasts, one per endpoint called

302.description: Agency logo found at remote url

404.description: Agency logo not found or not configured

get.description: View the agency logo for the hosted integration.

href.description: Relative URL to access agency logo

422.description: Integration conflict found while updating the image

put.description: Upload the agency logo for the hosted integration.

delete.description: Delete the agency logo and/or config if present.

302.description: Agent photo found at remote url

404.description: Agent photo not found or not configured

get.description: View the agent photo for the hosted integration.

href.description: Relative URL to access agent photo

422.description: Integration conflict found while updating the image

put.description: Upload an agent photo for the hosted integration.

delete.description: Delete the agent photo and/or config if present.

302.description: Brand logo found at remote url

404.description: Brand logo not found or not configured

get.description: View the brand logo for the integration.

href.description: Relative URL to access brand logo

422.description: Integration conflict found while updating the image

put.description: Upload the brand logo for the hosted integration.

delete.description: Delete the brand logo and/or config if present.

amount.description: The numeric monetary amount, displayed as a string. This can be positive or negative.

unit.description: The unit of the specified amount.

Address.title: Address
Address.description: A universal base object encapsulating the physical address related to another object.

line1.description: The first line of the address being provided.

line2.description: The second line of the address, when provided.

city.description: The city in which the address provided is located.

state.description: The state or provide in which the address is located, represented in abbreviated form.

postal_code.description: The 5 digit postal code in which the address is located.

BillingEvent.title: BillingEvent
BillingEvent.description: Describes an event which caused a change to the account balance.

account_id.description: The Account ID which was affected.

application_id.description: The Application ID (if any) associated with the event.

link_id.description: The ID of the link (if any) associated with the event.

environment.description: The environment that the application (if any) was configured with.

provider.description: The provider associated with the link (if any).

event_type.description: The type of action which resulted in this billing event.

tier.description: The tier which this billing event qualifies as, starting with "1" as Tier 1, as part of the tiered pricing structure.

amount.description: The monetary cost associated with this billing event. Negative values are deducted from your balance, and positive values are added to your balance. The value is represented in dollars, including fractional cents. For example, "3.2025" is 3 dollars, 20 cents, and 25 hundredths of a cent. Fractional cents are used to maintain an accurate account balance.

created_at.description: Time and date of event creation.

receipt.description: Link to download a copy of the receipt for the transaction if available.

Carrier.title: Carrier
Carrier.description: A basic object describing the individual insurance company which has issued a policy.

name.description: The name of the issuing company.

Coverage.title: Coverage
Coverage.description: Describes the features of a specific coverage element for a person or property, encapsulating the limits, deductibles, and premium information therein.

name.description: The name of the coverage element being described. This is a coded value offered as a convenience method to avoid the need to introspect code to understand which branch of logic is being evaluated.

limits.description: A breakout of different limits and sublimits that apply to this coverage item. When the limits property is null, then the coverage described is selected but limits are not applicable for the coverage feature. The ommission of any limit scope indicates that it does not apply to the coverage.

premium.description: The amount of premium being charged for this coverage item at the specified limits and deductibles.

CurrencyValue.title: CurrencyValue
CurrencyValue.description: Describes a value that is tied to a monetary amount. Most frequently used to describe limits, premiums, and deductibles.

unit.description: The ISO-compatible currency code of the value being represented.

Discount.title: Discount
Discount.description: Describes a discount which a policyholder is receiving for a particular covered property under a policy. When available, this object also describes the amount of savings.

code.description: The programming-friendly value to indicate the discount being applied. NOTE: We regularly add values to this enumeration, so your code should be able to gracefully handle unexpected enum values (though new values are documented here as they go live).

friendly_name.description: A human-readable, friendly name for the discount.

DistanceValue.title: DistanceValue
DistanceValue.description: Describes a value that is tied to a physical length or distance. Most frequently used to describe limits on coverages.

unit.description: The distance unit of the value being represented.

value.description: The amount of the distance in the units specified

DocumentRef.title: DocumentRef
DocumentRef.description: Describes the individual insurance document available for download from a given insurance policy, including the content-type (or mimetype) of the document.

type.description: The type of document provided at the corresponding URL.

content_type.description: The content-type, or mimetype, of the document being conveyed at this location.

href.description: The path to retrieve the document described in this object.

Driver.title: Driver
Driver.description: Describes the individual driver who is considered the routine operator of the vehicle it is attached to and who is explicitly included under the coverage terms selected for the vehicle.

date_of_birth.description: The date of birth of the driver, when provided by the insurer. Represented as an ISO-8601 date.

marital_status.description: The current marital status of the driver, if provided. The `separated` value includes divorced status.

gender.description: The reported gender of the driver, when provided by the insurer.

age_licensed.description: The age in which the driver was first licensed, when provided by the insurer.

license_number.description: The drivers license number of the driver when provided by the insurer. This value may be masked.

license_state.description: The state in which the driver is licensed. Represented in abbreviated form.

is_primary.description: A flag indicating if the driver is described as the primary driver of the vehicle. When no clear indication is made by an insurer, the first listed driver is assumed to be the primary.

EMail.title: EMail
EMail.description: A universal base object encapsulating the e-mail address related to another object.

Event.title: Event
Event.description: Represents an event delivered via webhook on the occurrence of certain policy changes.

id.description: The unique identifier of the received event.

event_type.description: An enumerated string representing the type of event that occurred.

occurred_at.description: The date and time in which the event occurred, represented as an ISO-8601 string.

_embedded.description: A collection of the objects in which this event applies to.

oneOf.description: The most recent webhook broadcast. Returned when viewing a list of Events.
A list of all webhook broadcasts for the event. Returned when viewing an individual Event.

payload.description: Link to view the full event payload.

EventBroadcast.title: EventBroadcast
EventBroadcast.description: Record of a broadcast to a webhook endpoint when an event is triggered.

queued_at.description: Date/Time the broadcast was prepared for delivery.

request_uri.description: URI the broadcast was sent to.

request_headers.description: Custom headers used to send the broadcast.

Integration.title: Integration
Integration.description: Represents a connection between a client application and Covie's systems allowing a client users to create and process links.

key.description: Integration key used in client application initialization.

name.description: A descriptive name of the integration.

status.description: String representation of the current status of the integration.

created_at.description: The date and time, in ISO-8601 format, when the integration was first created.

updated_at.description: The date and time, in ISO-8601 format, when the integration was last updated.

logo.description: Brand logo to be used in the embed.

primary.description: The primary color, text style color, and background color to use.

display_name.description: Name to display as application name in the embed, on policy selection and data disclosure screens.

use_name_as_display_name.description: Display the integration's name as the application name in the embed. Cannot be set at the same time as display_name.

allow_inactive.description: Allows users to link policies that are currently inactive.

effective_date.description: Allows users to link a policy if it will be active as of a given date. The date can be absolute (YYYY-MM-DD) or relative, with relative dates evaluated when the policy is being linked. Primarily used to allow pending policies to be linked. Incompatible with allow_inactive.

is_onboarding.description: Whether the integration is live, but belongs to a prepaid account that hasn't had its first refill

Interest.title: Interest
Interest.description: Describes an entity, person or company, that has a legal interest in a piece of covered property. This could represent a bank or other financial institution who owns a loan/mortgage/lien over a covered property, a landlord who owns the property a tenant is leasing, or some other recognized stakeholder who is entitled to certain information rights from the insurance company regarding the covered property.

type.description: The type of interest being described. Such as: lender, landlord, guarantor, or other.

email_addresses.description: E-Mail addresses used to contact the interested party.

phone_numbers.description: Phone Numbers used to call the interested party. Provided in E164 format.

fax.description: The Fax Number by which to contact the interested party. Provided in E164 format.

Link_2.title: Link
Link_2.description: Represents the individual connections between Covie and a Policyholder's account with a carrier and wraps the policies retrieved from it that have been made available to the consumer.

id.description: The unique identifier of the link object.

object.description: String representing the objects type. Objects of the same type share the same value.

integration_id.description: The identifier of the integration that was used to establish the link.

policy_count.description: The number of policies provided by this link.

status.description: A string representation of the link's current status. This is distinct from a policy's status which is an indicator to whether a policy is in force. A link's status is an indicator of how new and complete the data is and whether or not it is possible to retrieve refreshed information.

is_tracked.description: A flag indicating if the policies provided by this link should be tracked by Covie's monitoring service.

tracking_frequency.description: The frequency of which tracking should be performed. This value is `never` when tracking is disabled.

updated_at.description: The date and time, in ISO-8601 format, when the link was last updated.

created_at.description: The date and time, in ISO-8601 format, when the link was first created.

metadata.description: Arbitrary key value pairs set on link creation or PATCH. Keys are alphanumeric plus _, -, ., and space, at most 64 characters. Values are at most 256 characters. You can have at most 32 metadata keys on a link.

self.description: Link to retrieve the link's details.

uploaded_documents.description: List of documents uploaded for the link.

LinkWithPolicies.title: LinkWithPolicies
LinkWithPolicies.description: Represents the individual connections between Covie and a Policyholder's account with a carrier and wraps the policies retrieved from it that have been made available to the consumer.

policies.description: List of selected policies connected to this link.

Location.title: Location
Location.description: Describes a physical location and/or structure which is covered under the terms of an insurance policy.

coverages.description: A list of coverages that apply to the location being insured.

other_deductibles.description: A list of deductibles that apply in addition to the coverage-specific deductibles.

discounts.description: A list of discounts being applied to the location.

interests.description: A list of interested parties, such as mortgagers, lienholders, guarantors, landlords, or others.

Name.title: Name
Name.description: Contains a name for a person or business

PaymentMethod.title: PaymentMethodd
PaymentMethod.description: Describes a source which can be used to make payments towards account balance.

id.description: A unique identifier for this payment method.

is_default.description: Indicates wether this payment method is the preferred source used for account balance updates.

brand.description: The brand identifier of the card provider.

last4.description: The last 4 digits of the card

exp_month.description: The expiry month of the card.

exp_year.description: The expiry year of the card.

PercentageValue.title: PercentageValue

value.description: The percentage amount determined by this value.

PercentageValue.description: Describes a value that is represented as a percentage, fraction, or ratio of another value. Most frequently depicted for deductibles which may be a percentage of a limit.

PeriodValue.title: PeriodValue
PeriodValue.description: Describes a value that represents a period of time, such as days, weeks, or months.

unit.description: The scale of time period being represented.

value.description: The amount of time being represented.

Phone.title: Phone
Phone.description: A universal base object encapsulating the phone number related to another object.

Policy.title: Policy
Policy.description: This describes, in high level, the insurance policy record that is provided by a link. This object encapsulates all the necessary details to understand the policy's status, policyholders, and covered persons or properties.

id.description: Unique identifier of a policy record within the application that obtained it.

object.description: String representing the objects type. Objects of the same type share the same value.

fingerprint.description: A universally-unique identifier of a policy.

number.description: The full policy number as provided by the issuing company. This is not available to all users and may be null when not active on the account.

masked_number.description: This is a masked version of the policy number provided by the issuing company. This is always provided and available to all customers.

line.description: A string indicating the line of business this policy encompasses.

policyholders.description: A list of insureds, or policyholders assigned to this policy.

status.description: A string representation of the policy's current status.

premium.description: An integer indicating the total premium paid for the policy period. This value is null when premium access is not enabled on the customer account or is not able to be determined.

inception_date.description: The date when the policy becomes in force. This date is provided in ISO-8601 format excluding time.

expiration_date.description: The date when the described policy period ends. This date is provided in ISO-8601 format excluding time.

cancellation_date.description: The date when the policy is set to be cancelled. This date is provided in ISO-8601 format excluding time.

cancellation_reason.description: The determined reason for the cancellation, such as insured_non_payment or carrier_non_renew or insured_action. This value is null when cancellation is not active or not explicitly indicated by the carrier systems and is not guaranteed to be provided in any circumstance.

linked_at.description: The date and time which the policy was initially retrieved. This date and time is provided in ISO-8601 format.

last_synced_at.description: The date and time when the policy record was last updated. This date and time is provided in ISO-8601 format.

_links.description: A polymorphic list of externally linked resources related to this policy such as documents or logos for carriers.

documents.description: A list of documents obtained and available for this policy. This list may be empty if no documents are available or if document access is not enabled for your account.

carrier_logo.description: A link to the logo for the carrier on the policy.

_embedded.description: A container for objects wrapped by the current object.

missing_fields.description: A list of policy fields that were unable to be processed.

link_id.description: Unique identifier of the link associated to the policy.

Policyholder.title: Policyholder
Policyholder.description: Describes the company or person which is legally listed on, and entitled to benefits from the policy for which they are attached.

type.description: An indication if the insured is a business or individual.

email_addresses.description: The contact e-mail addresses of the insured, if known.

phone_numbers.description: The contact phone numbers of the insured, if known.

is_primary.description: A flag indicating if the insured is explicitly referenced as primary, or assumed primary as being the first insured listed on the policy.

Provider.title: Provider
Provider.description: Represents a connected insurance partner that can be used to authenticate and return policy data.

id.description: The unique identifier of the provider.

name.description: The friendly name of the provider in question.

_links.description: A collection of externally referenced material pertaining to the provider, such as web addresses and images.

image.description: The logo image to be used when describing a given provider.

href.description: The full URL to access the provider's logo.

website.description: A reference to the provider's primary website.

href.description: The full URL of the provider's main website.

_embedded.description: A collection of sub objects that are related to this provider, most commonly consisting of co-branded or sub-issuing providers affiliated with this provider.

alternative_providers.description: A collection of alternative providers which a policyholder may have issued policies through this top-level provider.

ReferralCode.title: ReferralCode
ReferralCode.description: Contains info for a referral code.

RelativeValue.title: RelativeValue
RelativeValue.description: Describes a value that is relative to another, such as the fair market value or replacement value. It is inherently variable and subject to the context in which it is invoked.

value.description:
The form of measure used to calculate the relative value, such as "actual cash value" or "ACV" which looks at the original price or investment and factors in depreciation (effectively "Fair Market Value"), or "replacement cost" (sometimes "Actual Loss Sustained" or "ALS") which sets a value against real cost to replace something today.

Occasionally, a response of "unknown" may be returned. This value indicates that no specific value was provided in high level policy documents. The value may be subjective and specific to the individual policyholder as specified in their policy contract and should be manually reviewed.

Vehicle.title: Vehicle
Vehicle.description: Describes the motor vehicle which is covered under the terms of a policy. This object contains details of the specific coverages provided for this vehicle and information about the drivers who are covered.

vin.description: The unique Vehicle Identification Number (VIN) that pertains to this vehicle.

make.description: The manufacturer of the vehicle covered by this policy.

model.description: The model of the vehicle covered by this policy.

year.description: The 4-digit model year of the vehicle covered by this policy.

trim.description: The trim of the vehicle covered by this policy.

series.description: The series of the vehicle covered by this policy.

annual_mileage.description: When provided, the estimated number of miles this vehicle is expected to be driven, per year. When a range is specified by the carrier, the highest value in the range is provided.

usage.description: The intended usage of the vehicle by the insured.

ownership.description: Whether or not the vehicle specified is owned, leased, or financed by the insured.

drivers.description: A list of drivers assigned to this vehicle.

interests.description: The financial institution which presently holds a lien against the vehicle.

coverages.description: A list of all coverages that apply to this vehicle. The omission of any coverage indicates that coverage was either declined or does not apply to this vehicle.

discounts.description: A list of discounts being applied to the premium of this vehicle.

Webhook.title: Webhook
Webhook.description: Represents a webhook in the Covie system.

id.description: Unique identifier for the Webhook object.

uri.description: URI the webhook should make a request to when the event is triggered.

headers.description: List of the headers and their values that should be included in the request.

last_response_body.description: The response from the last request.

last_response_code.description: The response HTTP code from the last request.

last_called_at.description: The last time a request was made.

updated_at.description: Date of the last time the webhook was updated.

BasicAuth.description: An application's Client ID and Client Secret are combined to form the username and password.

scopes.user: Used to manage user configuration and to request an account scoped token.
scopes.account.{account_id}: Used to manage accounts and configure applications. Permission is limited to the account identified.
scopes.application.{application_id}: Used to view and manage data within an application. Permission is limited to the application identified.
scopes.elevated.{entity_id}: Short lived token used for performing sensitive functionality. Permission is limited to the entity identified.

DashboardAuth.description: Authentication system used by the Client Dashboard.

Integration_id.name: integration_id
Integration_id.description: The unique identifier of the integration being inspected. Must be a valid integration under the application associated with the authenticated Client ID and Secret.

Integration_id_list.name: integration_ids
Integration_id_list.description: If provided, only show items with any of the specified integration IDs, comma-separated.

Integration_search.name: q
Integration_search.description: Partial integration name, ID, or integration key to search against, with or without leading in_/ik_

Invitation_id.name: invitation_id
Invitation_id.description: The unique identifier of the account invitation.

Link_created_since_date.name: created_since
Link_created_since_date.description: Limit results to links created on or after this date.

Link_created_until_date.name: created_until
Link_created_until_date.description: Limit results to links created on or before this date.

Link_has_metadata.name: has_metadata
Link_has_metadata.description: Filter whether a link has metadata attached

Link_id.name: id
Link_id.description: The unique identifier of the link being inspected.

Link_status.name: status
Link_status.description: Filter link status; separate multiple statuses (OR'd) with commas

Link_synced_since_date.name: synced_since
Link_synced_since_date.description: Limit results to links last synced on or after this date.

Link_synced_until_date.name: synced_until
Link_synced_until_date.description: Limit results to links last synced on or before this date.

Link_updated_since_date.name: updated_since
Link_updated_since_date.description: Limit results to links last updated on or since this date.

Link_updated_until_date.name: updated_until
Link_updated_until_date.description: Limit results to links last updated on or before this date.

Oauth_id.name: oauth_id
Oauth_id.description: Unique identifier of the OAuth client.

Offset.name: offset
Offset.description: Specifies the offset of the first result to return.

Policy_filter_type.name: policy_filter_type
Policy_filter_type.description: Show only these types of policies within each link. Does not affect which links are shown. Comma-separate to allow multiple policy types.

Policy_id.name: policy_id
Policy_id.description: The unique identifier of the policy object being sought.

Policy_types.name: required_policy_types
Policy_types.description: A pipe delineated list of policy types desired. Providers who do not support at least one required policy type will be excluded.

Provider_name_search.name: provider
Provider_name_search.description: Partial name of a provider to search against

Transaction_id.name: transaction_id
Transaction_id.description: Unique identifier of the billing event.

Transfer_id.name: transfer_id
Transfer_id.description: Unique identifier of the account transfer request.

User_update_id.name: update_id
User_update_id.description: Unique identifier of the pending user change.

schema.x-sl-error-message: You do not have permission to view this reference
You do not have permission to view this reference

items.x-sl-error-message: You do not have permission to view this reference

id.description: Unique identifier of the account transfer request.

created_at.description: The date the transfer was initiated

accepted_at.description: The date the transfer was accepted

rejected_at.description: The date the transfer was rejected

account.x-sl-error-message: You do not have permission to view this reference

from_user.x-sl-error-message: You do not have permission to view this reference

to_user.x-sl-error-message: You do not have permission to view this reference

count.description: Number of users in the account.

items.x-sl-error-message: You do not have permission to view this reference

account.x-sl-error-message: You do not have permission to view this reference

items.x-sl-error-message: You do not have permission to view this reference

schema.x-sl-error-message: You do not have permission to view this reference

count.description: The number of applications in the account.

items.x-sl-error-message: You do not have permission to view this reference

count.description: Total number of results that can be returned.

filtered_count.description: If a search filter is applied, this will return the total number of results that match the filter.

schema.x-sl-error-message: You do not have permission to view this reference

count.description: The total, unfiltered number of events without pagination

filtered_count.description: The unpaginated number of events matching the filter

count.description: The number of integrations in the application that match the filters.

links_successful_mtd.description: Count/Total of link.success events, current month-to-date (MTD)

links_tracked_mtd.description: Count/Total of link.track.* excluding our retry events, current month-to-date (MTD)

total_links.description: Count/Total of Link objects that are not in new status

total_linked_policies.description: Count/Total of Policy objects belonging to Links that are in non-new status

links_successful_by_day.description: Count/Total of link.success events, as a time series by day, 30-days rolling window

point.description: The date, in ISO-8601 format, associated with the data point.

value.description: The number of link.success events for the associated date

links_mtd.description: Count/Total of Link objects created, regardless of status, for the current month-to-date

links_by_day.description: Count/Total of Link objects created, regardless of status, as a time-series by day, 30 days rolling window

point.description: The date, in ISO-8601 format, associated with the data point.

value.description: The number of links created on the associated date

count.description: Total number of results that can be returned.

filtered_count.description: If a search filter is applied, this will return the total number of results that match the filter.

LinksWithPolicies.description: List of Links including selected Policies

count.description: Total number of results that can be returned.

filtered_count.description: If a search filter is applied, this will return the total number of results that match the filter.

schema.x-sl-error-message: You do not have permission to view this reference

count.description: Number of OAuth clients created for the application.

items.x-sl-error-message: You do not have permission to view this reference

message.description: A description of the error message

payment_error_code.description: An error code from a payment provider, typically a [stripe error code](https://stripe.com/docs/error-codes)

count.description: The number of payment methods that can be returned
Total number of results that can be returned.

filtered_count.description: The total number of policies that match the filter.

id.description: Unique identifier of the pending user change.

totp_provisioning_uri.description: URI to generate a QR code for a user to scan with their TOTP app.

schema.x-sl-error-message: You do not have permission to view this reference

filtered_count.description: Total webhooks that match the applied filter.
